summary: Led and mobilized data, web, cloud, and QA teams to build the company's data infrastructure from scratch
Led a 4-member data science team in developing an anomaly detection model to identify credential stuffing attacks from 50,000 cybersecurity incidents
Developed an upper body gesture recognition system from scratch using neural networks from data gathered on 11 adults
Developed an automatic insect recognition system for local farmers of Waterloo by classifying a species of moth across 5500 images
